name: @rgrove/parse-xml
description: A fast, safe, compliant XML parser for Node.js and browsers.
author: Ryan Grove <ryan@wonko.com>

scripts.build: pnpm run build:js && pnpm run build:bundle && pnpm run build:docs
scripts.coverage: nyc --reporter html --report-dir coverage pnpm test && open coverage/index.html
scripts.lint: pnpm run build:js && pnpm run lint:js
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build
scripts.test: pnpm run build:js && nyc --check-coverage --branches 100 --functions 100 --lines 100 --statements 100 mocha && pnpm run test:types
scripts.test:browser: pnpm run build:js && pnpm run build:bundle && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names build:bundle,build:js,webpack 'pnpm run build:bundle --watch' 'pnpm run build:js --watch' 'webpack serve --config tests/webpack.config.js'
scripts.test:watch: pnpm run build:js && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names build,mocha 'pnpm run build:js --watch' 'mocha --watch'
